job.title: Data Scientist

one of the top 50 startups in the US by LinkedIn in 2020 and have previously been announced as one of Modern Healthcares Best Places to Work in consecutive years We are excited about our growth trajectory and would love for you to be part of this exciting journeyppbrppWe are looking for a versatile strongData Scientiststrongemnbspemto join our Data Science amp Engineering team You will be responsible for turning medical claims data into measures and actionable insights within our Software as a Service SaaS solutions You will utilize your strong quantitative analysis and SAS and SQL skills to create and analyze scripts to compute metrics and impact downstream data sets You will work closely with our product teams to contribute to the product roadmap assist with user stories develop specifications and provide timeline estimations Additionally you will contribute to multiple initiatives both in a team and independent environment and youll have the ability to take direction run with idea and have a keen eye for improvements Were looking for someone who is intellectually curious who is passionate about continuous learning especially when solving problems within healthcare datappbrppAre you ready Join us as we empower meaningful change in healthcareppbrppstrongLocationnbspstrongPhiladelphia PA Atlanta GA RemoteppstrongReports tonbspstrongVP Data Science amp
